page.title: 10NEWPORT POLICE STATION
page.content: The police force on the I.O.W.is a devision of the Hampshire Constabulary and the Divisional Headquarters situated at Newport Police Station consists of a Chief Suerintedent,a Superinendent and a Chief Inspector. The Newport Section of the Division is made up of 1 Inspector, 6P/sergeants and 22 P/constables. Officers are assigned to sections as follows:- Ch/Insp. Insp. Ps. Pc. Drugs 0 0 0 2 C.I.D 0 0 0 8 Control room 0 0 1 8 S.B. 0 0 0 1 Prison liason 0 0 2 0 Mobile patrol 0 0 1 8 Collator 0 0 0 1 Process 0 1 0 2 Photo 0 0 0 1 A total of 57 police vehicles are kept and maintained at Newport.
